title: Maryamsoft Arabic WebFonts
content:
In conjunction of the national Father’s Day @ the birth anniversary of  
 [Imam Ali bn AbiTalib](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112647/http:/typophile.com/node/96179) (peace be upon him), [MaryamSoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112647/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/) is pleased to announce the release of [Arabic Web Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112647/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/WebFont/QalamWeb) that work more or less like rechargeable [skyfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112647/http:/www.fonts.com/browse/font-tools/skyfonts)  
Regards with [Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112647/http:/typophile.com/node/51401)
author: AzizMostafa
